tr_quotes.quote: Suyu anlamak demek, evreni, doğanın harikalarını ve yaşamın kendisini anlamak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Masaru Emoto

tr_quotes.quote: Pırıl pırıl gökkuşağını görmek için, önce yağmuru yaşamak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Fransız Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa bekçi ile değil, sevgi ile korunur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Toprağın dostlara ihtiyacı vardır; ona dostça davranalım!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimizin bir annesi vardır: Toprak.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Orman yurdun öz evladı ormansız yok dünya tadı.
tr_quotes.author: Aşık Veysel

tr_quotes.quote: Ağaç meyvesinden bilinir, yaprağından değil.
tr_quotes.author: John Ray

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa ve kitaplar, onları görebilen gözlere aittir.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Biz, tabiatı örnek alırsak asla yanılmayız.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyin prensibi sudur; her şey sudan gelir ve tekrar suya döner.
tr_quotes.author: Thales

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa, gençlere kuvvet, yaşlılara hikmet verir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiat aşkı, insanın ümitlerini boşa çıkarmayan yegâne aşktır.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamak! Bir ağaç gibi tek ve hür ve bir orman gibi kardeşçesine bu hasret bizim!
tr_quotes.author: Nazım Hikmet

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ulusun gerçek zenginliği, ağaç örtüsüyle ölçülebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Richard St. Barbe Baker

tr_quotes.quote: Güzellik, doğanın kadınlara verdiği ilk armağan, aynı zamanda geri aldığı ilk şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Fransız Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Her ferdi, hatta her topluluğu, hoşlandığı yem ile avlarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Hüseyin Rahmi Gürpınar

tr_quotes.quote: Doğaya hoyratça davranan toplumlara da insanlar arasındaki ilişkiler de hoyratça oluyorlar.
tr_quotes.author: John Bennet

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa bize aldırmadığından, doğanın ortasında kendimizi öyle rahat hissederiz ki.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche.

tr_quotes.quote: Pırıl pırıl gökkuşağını görmek için, önce yağmuru yaşamak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir milletin medeniyet seviyesi, üzerinde yaşadığı toprakları ağaçlandırmasıyla ölçülür.
tr_quotes.author: Franklin Roosvelt

tr_quotes.quote: Vatanın kalbi ormanların derinliklerinde saklıdır, ormansız bir millet ölmüş bir millettir.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Theuriet

tr_quotes.quote: Çiçekler doğanın en güzel süsüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa, saklanmayı sever.
tr_quotes.author: Herakleitos

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa, zorluklardan hoşlanmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Spinoza

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa, görülebilen düşüncedir.
tr_quotes.author: E.Crabbe

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiat, en şefkatli annedir.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Byron

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa, boşluklardan nefret eder.
tr_quotes.author: B.Pascal

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa bekçi ile değil, sevgi ile korunur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa, Allah’ın yazdığı bir kitaptır.
tr_quotes.author: Harvey

tr_quotes.quote: Bırakın da doğa size dadılık etsin.
tr_quotes.author: Wordsworth

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ağacın cinsi tuttuğu meyvesinden anlaşılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bütün sanat doğanın bir taklididir.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa sustuğu zaman insan konuşur.
tr_quotes.author: J. J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Ağaç meyvesinden bilinir, yaprağından değil.
tr_quotes.author: John Ray

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa; toprağı verdi, insanda şehirleri kurdu.
tr_quotes.author: Varrd

tr_quotes.quote: Doğanın en büyük armağanı, hayatın kısalığıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Pliny

tr_quotes.quote: Toprağın dostlara ihtiyacı vardır; ona dostça davranalım!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa, gençlere kuvvet, yaşlılara hikmet verir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa; dilsiz hayvanlara bile hürriyet vermiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Tacitus

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanı daha az değil, doğayı daha çok severim.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Byron

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek yasa, doğayla anlaşmada haklı bir nedendir.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiattan ayrılma, mutluluktan ayrılmadır.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ulusun kalbine sıkacaksan o zaman o ulusun ormanları yok et.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevgi dolu doğa bizi ağlatsa da, aklın neşesidir doğanın gözyaşları.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiat; bize bilginin tohumlarını vermiştir, bilginin kendisini değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa bazen insanın dostu olur, bazen ise acımasız bir canavara dönüşebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiat aşkı, insanın ümitlerini boşa çıkarmayan yegane aşktır.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ulusun gerçek zenginliği, ağaç örtüsüyle ölçülebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Richard St. Barbe Baker

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiatta her şey bir değişimdir. Ama her değişimin ardından, bir sonsuzluk yatar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Pırıl pırıl gökkuşağını görmek için, önce yağmuru yaşamak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Fransız Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Her ferdi, hatta her topluluğu, hoşlandığı yem ile avlarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Hüseyin Rahmi Gürpınar

tr_quotes.quote: Doğanın tutarlılığı, insanın tutarsızlığın dan sonra güzel bir tesellidir.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Hakarete uğramış doğa ile suçlu bir kalbin öcü,insan adaletinden çok daha güçlüdür!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğayı korumak bizlerin hepimizin görevidir. Bir ağacın yetişmesi yıllar almaktadır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğada başka hiçbir tür, insan kadar kibirli, açgözlü ve bencil değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Elif Şafak

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimiz bu doğanın insanlarıyız ve hepimiz topraktan geldik ve yine toprağa gideceğiz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiata karşı işlenen bir suçun intikamı, insan adaletinden daha zor olur.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın öğretmeninin doğa, kitabın insanlık ve okulunun yaşam olduğu bir gün gelecek mi?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir milletin doğal zenginliği, o ülkedeki ormanların çokluğu ile anlaşılır.
tr_quotes.author: Brake Kaster

tr_quotes.quote: Su doğada her şeydir; su topraktan doğar gezer, dolaşır yine toprağın derinlerinde kaybolur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğal güzelliklerimiz doğa bekçileri tarafından değil, sevgi gönüllüleri tarafından korunur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar doğaya aykırı davranıyorlar, çünkü farklı olmaya cesaret edemiyorlar.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamak! Bir ağaç gibi tek ve hür ve bir orman gibi kardeşçesine bu hasret bizim!
tr_quotes.author: Nazım Hikmet

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiat insana; sabrı, anlayışı, birlikte beraberce yaşamayı, yardımlaşmayı ve sevgiyi öğretir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa sanatçıları bulmuş, yapmış; artıklarından da eleştirmecileri meydana getirmiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Holmes

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanoğlunun çoğu kez çarpık olan usunun dokunmadığı doğanın görünümü ne güzeldi.
tr_quotes.author: Umberto Eco

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa ile ilgili olan ve doğasını koruyan medeniyetlerin gelişmişlik seviyesi her zaman yüksektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tabiatın tercümana ihtiyacı yoktur, onun güzelliğini anlamak için, açık bir ruh yeter.
tr_quotes.author: Karl Detler

tr_quotes.quote: Güzellik, doğanın kadınlara verdiği ilk armağan, aynı zamanda geri aldığı ilk şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Fransız Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Doğaya hoyratça davranan toplumlara da insanlar arasındaki ilişkiler de hoyratça oluyorlar.
tr_quotes.author: John Bennet

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın en büyük dostu topraktır. Toprak insanın elektriğini alır, stresini giderir, insanı rahatlatır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bu dünyada nereye gitsen doğanın güzelliği ve insanoğlunun zalimliği karşına çıkıyordu.
tr_quotes.author: Zülfü Livaneli

tr_quotes.quote: Vatanın kalbi ormanların derinliklerinde saklıdır, ormansız bir millet ölmüş bir millettir.
tr_quotes.author: Franklin Roosvelt

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya herkesin ihtiyacına yetecek kadarını sağlar, fakat herkesin hırsını karşılamaya yetecek olanı değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ulusun gelişmişlik seviyesi yaşadığı çevredeki toprakları ağaçlandırması ve doğayı koruması ile ölçülür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa bizi özgür ve bağımsız yaratmış, bizse tutup kendimizi birtakım kalıplar içine hapsediyoruz.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar doğaya aykırı davranıyorlar, çünkü farklı olmaya cesaret edemiyorlar.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Doğanın yasası bencilliktir, insan, kabul etsek de etmesek de, bencildir, böyle olması da doğaldır.
tr_quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

tr_quotes.quote: Dağlarda hayat, düzlüktekinden daha insancıldır. Halk birbirine daha yakındır, istenirse de daha uzak, ihtiyaçlar da daha az ama daha zorunlu.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç ırmak görmemiş biri ilk kez bir ırmak gördüğünde, deniz sanmış onu. Biz en büyük bildiğimiz şeyleri, doğanın o konuda ki son sınırları sayarız.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigné

tr_quotes.quote: Geliştirmiş olduğumuz tüm değerler, dünyanın gerçek doğasını görmemizi engellemek amacıyla geliştirilmiş araçlardan başka hiçbir şey değildirler.
tr_quotes.author: Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bu dünyanın doğasını yok edersek başka dünyamız olmayacak ve bize yeniden bir doğa verilmeyecek. Bu yüzden doğa ile barışık yaşamayı öğrenmeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa, bilgilerimizin kaynağıyla hayatın kaynağının aynı olmasını istemiştir; yaşamak için izlenimler edinmeliyiz; bilmek için izlenimler edinmeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan kendini iki yerde çok rahat hisseder; birincisi kendi evinde, ikincisi ise doğanın tam ortasında sessizliğin hakim olduğu bir anda.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta her şeyin bir kanunun olduğu gibi doğanın da kendine göre kanunları var. Eğer doğanın kanunlarına uymazsan yaşamın sona erebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa keşfedilmesi için bekleyen büyük bir hazinedir. Doğayı keşfe çıktığınız zaman alışkanı olur ve bir daha doğadan kopamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan doğa olmadan yaşabilir mi? Yaşayamaz. Çünkü ilaçlar bitkilerden, yediğimiz besinler doğadan, aldığımız nefes doğadan.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ağaç maziyi istikbale bağlar, size sabrı öğretir, beraber yaşamanın, birbirine faydalı olmanın zevkini verir.
tr_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

tr_quotes.quote: Doğanın insanlara en adilce dağıttığı nimet akıldır derler; çünkü hiç kimse, akıl payından şikâyetçi değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigné

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa bize her zaman ipucu sunar. Sürekli bir şeyler çıkartıp durur. Ve derken birdenbire ipucunu yakalarız.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Frost

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar arasındaki beşeri aşk insanı yanıltabilir ama tabiata olan aşk insanın umutlarını hiçbir zaman boşa çıkarmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat kısa, kuşlar uçuyor
tr_quotes.author: Cemal Süreya

en_quotes.quote: My wish is to stay always like this, living quietly in a corner of nature
en_quotes.author: Claude Monet

en_quotes.quote: In nature, light creates the color. In the picture, color creates the light
en_quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

en_quotes.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: There are moments when all anxiety and stated toil are becalmed in the infinite leisure and repose of nature
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: All things are artificial, for nature is the art of God
en_quotes.author: Thomas Browne

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me
en_quotes.author: Lindsay Lohan

en_quotes.quote: Let the rain kiss you. Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops. Let the rain sing you a lullaby
en_quotes.author: Langston Hughes

en_quotes.quote: One touch of nature makes the whole world kin
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine
en_quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Nature is the one song of praise that never stops singing
en_quotes.author: Richard Rohr

en_quotes.quote: In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower
en_quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

en_quotes.quote: Being alone on the moors is scary; as the rain clouds settle in, it makes you realise your place in nature
en_quotes.author: Dave Davies

en_quotes.quote: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises
en_quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

en_quotes.quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken
en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: I have always believed that your face is a mirror to your nature
en_quotes.author: Sridevi

en_quotes.quote: That the sea is one of the most beautiful and magnificent sights in Nature, all admit
en_quotes.author: John Joly

en_quotes.quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: Nature is the master of talents; genius is the master of nature
en_quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

en_quotes.quote: The sky is the part of creation in which nature has done for the sake of pleasing man
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: Listen to the sounds of nature. Wishing you the best on your trek towards your dreams
en_quotes.author: Kalpana Chawla

en_quotes.quote: I believe it is in my nature to dance by virtue of the beat of my heart, the pulse of my blood and the music in my mind
en_quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

en_quotes.quote: The woods are lovely, dark and deep. But I have promises to keep, and miles to go before I sleep
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: The old cathedrals are good, but the great blue dome that hangs over everything is better
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Nature uses human imagination to lift her work of creation to even higher levels
en_quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

en_quotes.quote: Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was
en_quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

en_quotes.quote: Flowers are the sweetest things God ever made and forgot to put a soul into
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: The sky broke like an egg into full sunset and the water caught fire
en_quotes.author: Pamela Hansford Johnson

en_quotes.quote: To me a lush carpet of pine needles or spongy grass is more welcome than the most luxurious Persian rug
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: I believe a leaf of grass is no less than the journey-work of the stars
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: What would be left of our tragedies if an insect were to present us his?
en_quotes.author: Emil Cioran

en_quotes.quote: Nature's beauty is a gift that cultivates appreciation and gratitude
en_quotes.author: Louie Schwartzberg

en_quotes.quote: If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently
en_quotes.author: Bill Watterson

en_quotes.quote: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Nature is an infinite sphere of which the center is everywhere and the circumference nowhere
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: The garden suggests there might be a place where we can meet nature halfway
en_quotes.author: Michael Pollan

en_quotes.quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: My soul can find no staircase to Heaven unless it be through Earth's loveliness
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: I think that I shall never see a poem lovely as a tree
en_quotes.author: Joyce Kilmer

en_quotes.quote: Nature provides exceptions to every rule
en_quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature
en_quotes.author: Gerard De Nerval

en_quotes.quote: I get inspiration from a lot of things around me - nature, hills, people, and even insects
en_quotes.author: Ruskin Bond

en_quotes.quote: Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing
en_quotes.author: John Donne

en_quotes.quote: Human nature is evil, and goodness is caused by intentional activity
en_quotes.author: Xun Kuang

en_quotes.quote: Some people walk in the rain, others just get wet
en_quotes.author: Roger Miller

en_quotes.quote: In the depth of winter I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: He is richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: For my part I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me dream
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: Mother Nature is the great equalizer. You can't get away from it
en_quotes.author: Christopher Heyerdahl

en_quotes.quote: What is mathematics? It is only a systematic effort of solving puzzles posed by nature
en_quotes.author: Shakuntala Devi

en_quotes.quote: Come forth into the light of things, let nature be your teacher
en_quotes.author: William Wordsworth

en_quotes.quote: I don't like formal gardens. I like wild nature. It's just the wilderness instinct in me, I guess
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: There is a certain enthusiasm in liberty, that makes human nature rise above itself, in acts of bravery and heroism
en_quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: Birds sing after a storm; why shouldn't people feel as free to delight in whatever sunlight remains to them?
en_quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: And out of darkness came the hands that reach thro' nature, moulding men
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: To sit in the shade on a fine day and look upon verdure is the most perfect refreshment
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: Once you see your nature, sex is basically immaterial
en_quotes.author: Bodhidharma

en_quotes.quote: I had to live in the desert before I could understand the full value of grass in a green ditch
en_quotes.author: Ella Maillart

en_quotes.quote: It is the nature of the strong heart, that like the palm tree it strives ever upwards when it is most burdened
en_quotes.author: Philip Sidney

en_quotes.quote: If you can't be in awe of Mother Nature, there's something wrong with you
en_quotes.author: Alex Trebek

en_quotes.quote: It is not only fine feathers that make fine birds
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: In nature there are few sharp lines
en_quotes.author: A. R. Ammons

en_quotes.quote: The happiness of the bee and the dolphin is to exist. For man it is to know that and to wonder at it
en_quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

en_quotes.quote: The violets in the mountains have broken the rocks
en_quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

en_quotes.quote: I'll walk where my own nature would be leading: It vexes me to choose another guide
en_quotes.author: Emily Bronte

en_quotes.quote: What's a butterfly garden without butterflies?
en_quotes.author: Roy Rogers

en_quotes.quote: The peacock has become one of my regular sources of inspiration from nature
en_quotes.author: Matthew Williamson

en_quotes.quote: There are two places where I can completely relax: in nature and by the piano
en_quotes.author: Sigrid

en_quotes.quote: The sky is the source of light in nature - and governs everything
en_quotes.author: John Constable

en_quotes.quote: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself
en_quotes.author: L. Wolfe Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: For me nature is not landscape, but the dynamism of visual forces
en_quotes.author: Bridget Riley

en_quotes.quote: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever
en_quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

en_quotes.quote: I am following Nature without being able to grasp her, I perhaps owe having become a painter to flowers
en_quotes.author: Claude Monet

en_quotes.quote: Art is a harmony parallel with nature
en_quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

en_quotes.quote: He that will enjoy the brightness of sunshine, must quit the coolness of the shade
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: When I pray, I always thank Mother Nature for all the beauty in the world. It's about having an attitude of gratitude
en_quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

en_quotes.quote: Nature is the glass reflecting God, as by the sea reflected is the sun, too glorious to be gazed on in his sphere
en_quotes.author: Brigham Young

en_quotes.quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: I can find God in nature, in animals, in birds and the environment
en_quotes.author: Pat Buckley

en_quotes.quote: By nature, I keep moving, man. My theory is, be the shark. You've just got to keep moving. You can't stop
en_quotes.author: Brad Pitt

en_quotes.quote: There is the sky, which is all men's together
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Colors are the smiles of nature
en_quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

en_quotes.quote: Winter is nature's way of saying, 'Up yours.'
en_quotes.author: Robert Byrne

en_quotes.quote: If you wish to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first invent the universe
en_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

en_quotes.quote: The true nature of evil is that it is so very casual
en_quotes.author: James St. James

en_quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Nature is something outside our body, but the mind is within us
en_quotes.author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

en_quotes.quote: Whenever I get fed up with life I love to go wandering in nature
en_quotes.author: Andrea Arnold

en_quotes.quote: Sunsets are so beautiful that they almost seem as if we were looking through the gates of Heaven
en_quotes.author: John Lubbock

en_quotes.quote: We all have these shades in our nature: it's a spectrum within all of us
en_quotes.author: Johnny Flynn

en_quotes.quote: Our minds and memories are crowded with the common experience of nature
en_quotes.author: Sadie Jones

en_quotes.quote: Miracles are not contrary to nature, but only contrary to what we know about nature
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: The fairest thing in nature, a flower, still has its roots in earth and manure
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: The good man is the friend of all living things
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit
en_quotes.author: Edward Abbey

en_quotes.quote: God - God's the wrong word - goddess or nature will conspire to transform you in a way you couldn't have imagined
en_quotes.author: Anohni

en_quotes.quote: Oh, the summer night, Has a smile of light, And she sits on a sapphire throne
en_quotes.author: Bryan Procter

en_quotes.quote: Give me odorous at sunrise a garden of beautiful flowers where I can walk undisturbed
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: External nature is only internal nature writ large
en_quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

en_quotes.quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous
en_quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

en_quotes.quote: If you can't sit in a cafe quietly and be ignored, how can you observe human nature and write a story?
en_quotes.author: Evangeline Lilly

en_quotes.quote: Sunset is still my favorite color, and rainbow is second
en_quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

en_quotes.quote: We are all full of weakness and errors; let us mutually pardon each other our follies - it is the first law of nature
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: The breaking of a wave cannot explain the whole sea
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

en_quotes.quote: There are always flowers for those who want to see them
en_quotes.author: Henri Matisse

en_quotes.quote: I look around me and nowhere do I see a stamp of disapproval with which nature marked a woman's candid brow
en_quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

en_quotes.quote: You can't be suspicious of a tree, or accuse a bird or a squirrel of subversion or challenge the ideology of a violet
en_quotes.author: Hal Borland

en_quotes.quote: The moon looks upon many night flowers; the night flowers see but one moon
en_quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

en_quotes.quote: It's my nature to be fearless
en_quotes.author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

en_quotes.quote: Night comes to the desert all at once, as if someone turned off the light
en_quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

en_quotes.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world the master calls a butterfly
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: Clouds symbolize the veils that shroud God
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: The trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit
en_quotes.author: Moliere

en_quotes.quote: I'm experimental by nature... always exploring my creativity
en_quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

en_quotes.quote: Deep in their roots, all flowers keep the light
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

en_quotes.quote: Should you shield the canyons from the windstorms you would never see the true beauty of their carvings
en_quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

en_quotes.quote: Man can never be a woman's equal in the spirit of selfless service with which nature has endowed her
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: I decided that if I could paint that flower in a huge scale, you could not ignore its beauty
en_quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

en_quotes.quote: What we observe is not nature itself, but nature exposed to our method of questioning
en_quotes.author: Werner Heisenberg

en_quotes.quote: Forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: All water has a perfect memory and is forever trying to get back to where it was
en_quotes.author: Toni Morrison

en_quotes.quote: Let a hundred flowers bloom, let a hundred schools of thought contend
en_quotes.author: Mao Zedong

en_quotes.quote: Everybody makes mistakes, but when goalkeepers make them, it is costly. That's the nature of being a goalkeeper
en_quotes.author: Gary Speed

en_quotes.quote: When nature has work to be done, she creates a genius to do it
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Human nature is potentially aggressive and destructive and potentially orderly and constructive
en_quotes.author: Margaret Mead

en_quotes.quote: Even Kings and emperors with heaps of wealth and vast dominion cannot compare with an ant filled with the love of God
en_quotes.author: Guru Nanak

en_quotes.quote: The tree that is beside the running water is fresher and gives more fruit
en_quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

en_quotes.quote: To be rude to someone is not my nature
en_quotes.author: Farrah Fawcett

en_quotes.quote: By its very nature the beautiful is isolated from everything else. From beauty no road leads to reality
en_quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

en_quotes.quote: Being inexhaustible, life and nature are a constant stimulus for a creative mind
en_quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

en_quotes.quote: Painting from nature is not copying the object; it is realizing one's sensations
en_quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

en_quotes.quote: Adapt or perish, now as ever, is nature's inexorable imperative
en_quotes.author: H. G. Wells

en_quotes.quote: My aim in painting has always been the most exact transcription possible of my most intimate impression of nature
en_quotes.author: Edward Hopper

en_quotes.quote: Mountains are earth's undecaying monuments
en_quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

en_quotes.quote: If one way be better than another, that you may be sure is nature's way
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Fishes live in the sea, as men do a-land; the great ones eat up the little ones
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: The lake and the mountains have become my landscape, my real world
en_quotes.author: Georges Simenon

en_quotes.quote: Joy in looking and comprehending is nature's most beautiful gift
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Now that I'm older, I have a much better appreciation of nature, and I love being alone
en_quotes.author: Gia Coppola

en_quotes.quote: What is the good of your stars and trees, your sunrise and the wind, if they do not enter into our daily lives?
en_quotes.author: E. M. Forster

en_quotes.quote: Race hate isn't human nature; race hate is the abandonment of human nature
en_quotes.author: Orson Welles

en_quotes.quote: Pure drawing is an abstraction. Drawing and colour are not distinct, everything in nature is coloured
en_quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

en_quotes.quote: Solitary trees, if they grow at all, grow strong
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Mother Nature made me the way I am, and I should be happy
en_quotes.author: Karolina Kurkova

en_quotes.quote: Reality must take precedence over public relations, for nature cannot be fooled
en_quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

en_quotes.quote: By nature all men are equal in liberty, but not in other endowments
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: See that the imagination of nature is far, far greater than the imagination of man
en_quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

en_quotes.quote: Blue, green, grey, white, or black; smooth, ruffled, or mountainous; that ocean is not silent
en_quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

en_quotes.quote: No man should bring children into the world who is unwilling to persevere to the end in their nature and education
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Nature chooses who will be transgender; individuals don't choose this
en_quotes.author: Mercedes Ruehl

en_quotes.quote: In wilderness I sense the miracle of life, and behind it our scientific accomplishments fade to trivia
en_quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: Simplicity is natures first step, and the last of art
en_quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

en_quotes.quote: Everything in excess is opposed to nature
en_quotes.author: Hippocrates

en_quotes.quote: To be interested in the changing seasons is a happier state of mind than to be hopelessly in love with spring
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is art if it does not come from nature
en_quotes.author: Antoni Gaudi

en_quotes.quote: Human life is as evanescent as the morning dew or a flash of lightning
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: Nature uses as little as possible of anything
en_quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

en_quotes.quote: And Fall, with her yeller harvest moon and the hills growin' brown and golden under a sinkin' sun
en_quotes.author: Roy Bean

en_quotes.quote: The nature of God is a circle of which the center is everywhere and the circumference is nowhere
en_quotes.author: Empedocles
